SSG_Tools.RayTools
Class Plane

java.lang.Object
  SSG_Tools.RayTools.Plane

public class Plane
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an infinite plane by a point on the plane and a normal direction. Basic intersection and reflection methods for a ray intersecting a plane are included.

Constructor Summary
Plane()
          Construct the xy plane by default
Plane(Vector3D point, Vector3D normal)
          Construct the plane passing through the specified point and with the specified plane normal.
 
Method Summary
 float distance(Vector3D a_point)
          Find the distance from the specified point to this plane.
 Vector3D getNormal()
          Get a copy of the normal that is used to define this plane.
 Vector3D getPoint()
          Get a copy of the point on this plane that is used to define the plane.
 Vector3D intersect(Ray ray)
          Find the point of intersection of the specified Ray with this plane.
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
          Main program with basic tests for the methods of this class.
 Ray reflect(Ray ray)
          Find the reflected ray when the specified ray hits this plane.
 void setNormal(Vector3D normal)
          Set the normal used to define this plane to the specified vector.
 void setPoint(Vector3D point)
          Set the point used to define this plane to the specified point.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Get a multiline string listing the point and normal that define this plane.

intersect

public Vector3D intersect(Ray ray)
Find the point of intersection of the specified Ray with this plane.

Parameters:
ray - The ray for which the intersction with this plane is calculated.
Returns:
the point of intersection of the Ray with this plane, or null if the Ray does not intersect the plane.

Find the reflected ray when the specified ray hits this plane.

Parameters:

Returns:
